TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecificControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 为 DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造提供分析支持。

span.span: Provides parsing support for DeviceSpecific/Choice constructs.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类内部创建并页分析器在分析时使用[\<设备特定 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8)元素。The class is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) element. 类实现以下的持久性行为： 它忽略直接在控件内的空白区域，仅允许[\<选择 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素作为子级。The class implements the following persistence behaviors: It ignores white space directly inside the control, and it allows only a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element as child.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在分析过程中由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用，但不可直接在代码中调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.
